name: FS&S - Organic tache wax 15ml - Ylang Yland & Sandalwood
description:
Be you an avid tache twirler or just a gentleman in search of a firm wax to hold those stubborn moustache hairs in place. Whether or not you spell it tache, tash, stache, moustache, mustache or mo our Ylang Ylang & Sandalwood is for you.

With a firm hold our wax holds all day long come rain or shine. Made with the finest organic Cera Flava of cosmetic grade and blended perfectly with pure Ylang Ylang & Sandalwood 100% essential oil. Delivered in all its splendour in a handy pocket size screw top 15ml tin.

INGREDIENTS:
Cera Flava (Yellow bees wax), Sandalwood(essential oil), Ylang Ylang(essential oil), Organic Rapeseed , Pure Vitamin E.

NOTE:
Not suitable for vegans.

name: FS&S - Organic tache wax 15ml - Vanilla
description:
Be you a moustache enthusiast or just a gent in search of a firm wax to hold those stubborn tache hairs in place. Whether or not you spell it tache, tash, stache, moustache, mustache or mo our Vanilla wax is for you.

With a firm hold our wax holds all day long come rain or shine. Made with the finest organic Cera Flava of cosmetic grade and blended perfectly with pure Vanilla 100% essential oil. Delivered in all its splendour in a handy pocket size screw top 15ml tin 

INGREDIENTS:
Cera Flava (Yellow bees wax), Vanilla(essential oil), Organic Rapeseed , Pure Vitamin E.

NOTE:
Not suitable for vegans.

THIS ITEM WILL NOT BE POSTED UNTIL 26/11/13

name: FS&S - Organic tache wax 15ml - Twin pack
description:
This twin pack of our glorious ylang ylang & sandalwood and vanilla waxes are perfect for the daily moustache curler in need of a little extra wax or the fine folk who carry a rather large moustache over their top lip. Also saving you money too!


NOTE:
Not suitable for vegans.

SAVING WITH THIS PACK:
£2.99

THIS ITEM WILL NOT BE POSTED UNTIL 26/11/13

name: FS&S - Natural Beard Oil 10ml - Autumn Warmth
description:
Be you biker, metalhead, lumberjack or beard enthusiast our natural beard oils are for you. 
Our Autumn Warmth beard oil is a seasonal special which will change with the seasons and is only available for three months of the year.

Our beard oil is a complementary blend of 100% pure base oils and 100% pure essential oils with added natural multivitamins that promote hair growth, soften skin and hair, strengthen hair at the roots, moisturise skin and hair, prevent itchiness and ensure that the hair is bursting with life with its natural glory!


INGREDIENTS:
Sweet Almond(pure),Cedarwood(essential oil),Blackpepper(essential oil),Rosewood(essential oil),Patchouli(essential oil),Vitamin e(pure)

NOTE:
May contain trace of nuts.
May contain trace of black pepper
We suggest using a tiny drop on your skin as in some cases irritation can occur.

name: FS&S - Natural Beard Oil 30ml- Autumn Warmth
description:

name: FS&S - Natural Beard Oil 10ml - Citrus Forrest
description:
Be you biker, metalhead, lumberjack or beard enthusiast our natural beard oils are for you. 
Our Citrus Forrest is our all year round beard oil. With a delightful scent this oil really captures the imagination, with eyes closed you can envision being in a forest walking past trees tall and small with a cool citrus breeze blowing through, a smell palatable to the nostrils.

Our beard oil is a complementary blend of 100% pure base oils and 100% pure essential oils with added natural multivitamins that promote hair growth, soften skin and hair, strengthen hair at the roots, moisturise skin and hair, prevent itchiness and ensure that the hair is bursting with life with its natural glory!


INGREDIENTS:
Jojoba(pure),Castor(pure),Sweet Almond(pure),Cedarwood(essential oil),Sandalwood(essential oil),Pine(essential oil),Lime(essential oil),Vitamin e(pure)

NOTE:
May contain trace of nuts.
We suggest using a tiny drop on your skin as in some cases irritation can occur.

name: FS&S -10ml Gentleman's Package
description:
A natural cotton draw string bag houses two of our finest products.
    
      A 15ml tin of our organic moustache wax Ylang Ylang & Sandalwood

     A 10ml dropper bottle of our finest natural beard oil. Either Autumn Warmth or Citrus Forest

      So treat yourself or a friend/loved one to this wonderful little gift bag and you'll be doing yourself or someone a favour by treating your/their facial hair to natures delights!

This gift bag will also save you £2.49!

£1 pound from each sale will be donated to Movember.

PLEASE CHOOSE YOUR PACKAGE CAREFULLY TO AVOID RECEIVING UNEXPECTED PRODUCTS.

name: Kent Moustache & Beard Comb 81T
description: Kent's Moustache & Beard combs are fine hand made combs excellent for combing our moustache wax right to the tips of your tache or combing your beard after using our finest beard oils.

name: Kent folding hair combs 82T
description:
Kent's 82T folding comb is a fine hand made comb excellent for combing ones hair into desired styles and folding away into a pocket size comb for the gentleman on the move.

THIS IS A PRE ORDER ITEM AND WILL NOT BE SHIPPED UNTIL SATURDAY NOVEMBER 19th. ANY OTHER ITEMS ORDERED ALONG WITH THIS COMB WILL BE PUT ON HOLD UNTIL SAID DISPATCH DATE.UK ORDERS WILL BE SENT 1ST CLASS NEXT WORKING DAY AND INTERNATIONAL WILL BE SENT 1 CLASS AIRMAIL (5-7DAYS)

name: Kent Slim Jim hair comb
description:
Kent's Slim Jim comb is a fine hand made comb excellent for combing ones hair into desired styles and fits nicely into a pocket for the gentleman on the move.

THIS IS A PRE ORDER ITEM AND WILL NOT BE SHIPPED UNTIL SATURDAY NOVEMBER 19th. ANY OTHER ITEMS ORDERED ALONG WITH THIS COMB WILL BE PUT ON HOLD UNTIL SAID DISPATCH DATE.UK ORDERS WILL BE SENT 1ST CLASS NEXT WORKING DAY AND INTERNATIONAL WILL BE SENT 1 CLASS AIRMAIL (5-7DAYS)

name: Kent R7T coarse and fine hair comb
description:
A splendid handmade comb from Kent's finest collection of saw cut combs. 

A 113mm combs with both small and large teeth for fine and coarse hair. An excellent grooming accessory.

name: Kent VS60 pure bristle (badger effect) shaving brush
description: A beautiful black barrel brush by Kent filed with pure bristle and finished with a badger bristle effect.

name: FS&S - Wax gift set
description:
A lightweight wooden box houses two of our finest natural organic moustache wax.One vanilla and one Ylang Ylang and Sandalwood

Make a fine sir's day this Christmas and keep his tach stiffer than ever!

Gift wrapping and "to & from" tags are available from the drop down menu, please note due to the bespoke nature of this option please allow up to 7 days for dispatch as sometimes it can create conflict with our busy schedule.

name: FS&S - Gentleman's Gift Set
description:
A black snap shut box houses two of our finest natural organic moustache wax.One vanilla and one Ylang Ylang and Sandalwood and two 30ml beard oils both citrus forest and Autumn warmth. Also including two hand made saw cut combs from Kent, A 81T moustache & beard comb and a Slim Jim hair or beard comb.

This package would make any furry gentleman's Christmas! Our whole collection all in one pack with an incredible saving!

Gift wrapping and "to & from" tags are available from the drop down menu, please note due to the bespoke nature of this option please allow up to 7 days for dispatch as sometimes it can create conflict with our busy schedule.
